info.title: DX Personalization REST APIs
info.description:
This gives you access to personalization features through REST services.

Currently APIs are developed for Visibility Rule, Profiler, Select Action, and Binding rule types.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
The offset and limit parameters can be leveraged to limit the results -
 
  limit is the number of results which will be returned. (e.g. 10). Default is 30.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset is the starting point from which results will be returned. (e.g. 20). Default is 0.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description:
Provide the keyword to perform search based on depth. (e.g. Children). [ Allowed Depth: Children, Descendants ]. 
 
 **NOTE:** Null depth value will result in same response as depth: descendants.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description:
Provide folder for which the sub-folders to be queried. 
 
 **NOTE:** If the parent value is left empty it will fetch workspace and all the descendant/child folders present in workspace based on depth selected.

value.folderType: Field to indicate folder type root folder (Workspace) or custom Folder
value.description: Field to indicate description of the folder.
value.title: Field to indicate that title of the folder.
value.authors: Field to indicate that owner of the folder.
value.creator: Field to indicate that creator of the folder.
value.created: Field to indicate that creation date and time of the folder.
value.lastModified: Filed to indicate that last modified date and time of the folder.
value.lastModifier: Filed to indicate that details of the user who is last modified the folder.
value.parentId: Field to indicate to find the difference between the location of the folder.

200.description: For success case, API returns list of folders from specified inputs..

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

get.summary: This endpoint returns the list of all folders.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

value.description: Demo folder
value.title: DemoFolder
value.authors: uid=wpsadmin,o=defaultWIMFileBasedRealm
value.creator: wpsadmin
value.lastModifier: wpsadmin

value.folderType: Field to indicate folder type root folder (Workspace) or custom Folder
value.description: Field to indicate description of the folder.
value.title: Field to indicate that title of the folder.
value.authors: Field to indicate that owner of the folder.
value.creator: Field to indicate that creator of the folder.
value.created: Field to indicate that creation date and time of the folder.
value.lastModified: Filed to indicate that last modified date and time of the folder.
value.lastModifier: Filed to indicate that details of the user who is last modified the folder.
value.parentId: Field to indicate to find the difference between the location of the folder.

200.description: For success case, API returns details of created folder.

post.summary: This endpoint creates a new folder.
post.description:
To create a folder, title is mandatory field, description and parentId are optional.
The default value of description and parentId (if not passed) is empty string and root folder/workspace id respectively.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

200.description: For the success case, the API returns folder details for the given folder uuid.

get.summary: This endpoint returns the individual folder details using the folder-id, folder-id is the UUID of the folder.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

value.folderType: Field to indicate folder type root folder (Workspace) or custom Folder
value.description: Field to indicate description of the folder.
value.title: Field to indicate that title of the folder.
value.authors: Field to indicate that owner of the folder.
value.creator: Field to indicate that creator of the folder.
value.created: Field to indicate that creation date and time of the folder.
value.lastModified: Filed to indicate that last modified date and time of the folder.
value.lastModifier: Filed to indicate that details of the user who is last modified the folder.
value.parentId: Field to indicate to find the difference between the location of the folder.

200.description: For the success case, the API returns updated folder details for the given folder uuid.

put.summary: This endpoint updates the folder using folder-id.
put.description:
Pass only those key value pairs which you want to update.
Keys which can be updated individually from the request body - "title", "description" and "parentId"
Note 1: Updating a root folder/workspace is restricted. The API returns a 403 error code for this scenario.
Note 2: The parentId input is to be passed if the selected Personalization folder has to be moved to a different location.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

delete.summary: This endpoint deletes a folder using folder-id.
delete.description:
Note 1: When deleting a folder, it would delete all the rules and sub-folders created within it.
Note 2: Deleting a root folder/workspace is restricted.

parameters.name: folder-id
parameters.description: UUID of Folder.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The offset and limit parameters can be leveraged to limit the results - limit is the number of results which will be returned. (e.g. 10). Default is 30.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset and limit parameters can be leveraged to limit the results - offset is the starting point from which results will be returned. (e.g. 20). Default is 0.

parameters.name: ruleType
parameters.description: Provide the keyword to perform search based on rule type. (e.g. Visibility Rule). [ Allowed Rule Types: Visibilty Rule, Profiler, Select Action ].

items.description: This is visibility rule to show.
items.title: VisibilityRuleShow
items.creator: uid=wpsadmin,o=defaultWIMFileBasedRealm

items.description: This is visibility rule to hide.
items.title: VisibilityRuleHide

and.operator: is greater than or equal to

items.creator: uid=wpsadmin,o=defaultWIMFileBasedRealm

value.description: Field to indicate description of the rule.
value.title: Field to indicate that title of the rule.
value.ruleType: Field to indicate rule type(Eg - Visibility Rule or Profiler Rule).
value.authors: Field to indicate that owner of the rule.
value.creator: Field to indicate that creator of the rule.
value.created: Field to indicate that creation date and time of the rule.
value.lastModified: Filed to indicate that last modified date and time of the rule.
value.lastModifier: Filed to indicate that details of the user who is last modified the rule.
value.parentId: Field to indicate to find the difference between the location of the rule.
value.visibility: Field to add 'show' or 'hide' if the 'conditions' are met.
value.otherwise: Field to add 'show' or 'hide' if the 'conditions' are not met.
value.caseInsensitive: Boolean indication that the string comparisons in the rule should be case insensitive.
value.conditions: List of conditions to meet the visibility rule criteria.

value.description: Field to indicate description of the rule.
value.title: Field to indicate that title of the rule.
value.ruleType: Field to indicate rule type(Eg - Visibility Rule or Profiler Rule).
value.authors: Field to indicate that owner of the rule.
value.creator: Field to indicate that creator of the rule.
value.created: Field to indicate that creation date and time of the rule.
value.lastModified: Filed to indicate that last modified date and time of the rule.
value.lastModifier: Filed to indicate that details of the user who is last modified the rule.
value.parentId: Field to indicate to find the difference between the location of the rule.
value.profiles: List of profiles created. Array of objects.
value.profileName: Profile name to be selected if the 'conditions' are met.
value.conditions: List of conditions to meet the Profiler rule criteria.
value.otherwiseProfile: Fall back profile name if none of the conditions for other profiles are not met.
value.caseInsensitive: Boolean indication that the string comparisons in the rule are case insensitive.
value.stopFirstProfile: Boolean indication that the rule returns the first matching profile for the current user.

value.description: Field to indicate description of the rule.
value.title: Field to indicate that title of the rule.
value.ruleType: Field to indicate rule type(Eg - Visibility Rule or Profiler Rule or Binding).
value.authors: Field to indicate that owner of the rule.
value.creator: Field to indicate that creator of the rule.
value.created: Field to indicate that creation date and time of the rule.
value.lastModified: Filed to indicate that last modified date and time of the rule.
value.lastModifier: Filed to indicate that details of the user who is last modified the rule.
value.parentId: Field to indicate to find the difference between the location of the rule.
value.conditions: List of conditions to meet the binding rule criteria.
value.profiler: Contains the condition for profiles & which action should be performed
value.actions: Field to indicate the details of the select action / binding rule which can perform an Action based on it.
value.otherwiseActions: Fall back action if none of the conditions are met.
value.stopFirstMatch: Boolean indication if the rule matching has to stop after the first match.
value.profilerName: Field to indicate the path of the profiler rule
value.quickProfiler: Field to indicate direct conditions for the profiler rule

200.description: For success case, API returns list of rules from specified inputs.

400.description: Returns the bad request error if the input parameters are missing/invalid.

post.summary: This endpoint creates a new rule.
post.description:
This API will create Visibilty, Profiler, Binding and Select Action Rule.
Note: Allowed attribute types: BrowserCapability, Date, Device, Referrer, ActionBean, CategoryBean, Action Count, Category Count, User, Shared Render Parameters, Session, Shared Data, Portlet Attributes, Request, Profiler, Arithmetic and MatchingItems. For arithmetic rules a combination of multiple operations (i.e. 7+9*2) is not supported at this time.

requestBody.description: Allowed ruleTypes : Visibility Rule, Profiler, Select Action & Binding.

put.description:
Pass only those key value pairs which you want to update.
Keys which can be updated individually from the request body - "description", "title", "ruleType", "contents", "parentId"
& keys which can be updated individually inside contents for specific ruleType:
  • Visibility Rule : "visibility", "conditions", "caseInsensitive",
  • Profiler : "profiles", "otherwiseProfile","caseInsensitive", "stopFirstProfile"
  • Select Action : Not Applicable
  • Binding : Not Applicable

Note: Updating a ruleType is restricted.

value.description: Field to indicate description of the rule.
value.title: Field to indicate that title of the rule.
value.ruleType: Field to indicate rule type(Eg - Visibility Rule or Profiler Rule).
value.authors: Field to indicate that owner of the rule.
value.creator: Field to indicate that creator of the rule.
value.created: Field to indicate that creation date and time of the rule.
value.lastModified: Filed to indicate that last modified date and time of the rule.
value.lastModifier: Filed to indicate that details of the user who is last modified the rule.
value.parentId: Field to indicate to find the difference between the location of the rule.
value.conditions: List of conditions to meet the binding rule criteria.
value.profiler: Contains the condition for profiles & which action should be performed
value.actions: Field to indicate the details of the select action / binding rule which can perform an Action based on it.
value.otherwiseActions: Fall back action if none of the conditions are met.
value.stopFirstMatch: Boolean indication if the rule matching has to stop after the first match.
value.profilerName: Field to indicate the path of the profiler rule
value.quickProfiler: Field to indicate direct conditions for the profiler rule

200.description: For the success case, the API returns updated rule details for the given rule uuid.

put.summary: This endpoint updates the rule using rule-id.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

delete.summary: This endpoint deletes a Rule using rule-id.

parameters.name: rule-id
parameters.description: UUID of rule.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

value.result: Field to indicate result as show/hide after invoking Visibility rule.

200.description: For the success case, the API returns rule invoke details for the given rule uuid.

post.summary: This endpoint invokes the rule using rule-id, rule-id being the uuid of the rule.

parameters.name: rule-id
parameters.description: UUID of rule that needs to be invoked.

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Contains the access or authentication token. Leave this field empty if you are already authenticated, unless you intend to put a token value.

value.attributeType: Field Contains list of dynamic-properties. And indicate under which attribute type it created.
value.Name: Field to indicate name of the dynamic-properties.
value.displayName: Field to indicate display name of the dynamic-properties
value.propertyType: Field to indicate attributeName of the attributeType.

200.description: For the success case, the API returns List of dynamic properties.

get.summary: This endpoint returns the list of dynamic properties.
